The NAEB Research Seminar is on schedule and -will be held at
Columbus all of next veek* Last August at the Research Conference in
ChieagOf I proposed Westley as a possible participant to the seminar*
Howew, I withdrew that n«ne \iien I heard from you saying that you ex¬
pected a new man in this fall to do research studies*
I guess I ‘m guilty of being unfaithful to Wisconsin for not follow¬
ing through on this^ but I was under the impression I would hear from
you if things worked out as planned*
Although transportation funds have already been allocated to the
twenty participants and staff members, I am certain that we would be more
than pleased to have either Westley or your new man sit in on all of the
seminar* To keep things clear, however, would you please check that out
with Keith Tyler idio is acting as Chairman for this meeting*
Speaking of being embarassed, X was also faced Tidth the same problems
Didc Husband, who used to be in Psychology at UW, and now here, wasn*t
inrited until about an hour ago*•••and I waa faced with the problem of having
to talk to him at the last moment*
Please give mgr best regards to Dr* Ewbank and may I wish all of you
a fine Wisconsin holidayi
Cordially,
Raymond D* Cheydleur, Chairman
